title: Revisit The OPL Show: Grand Final Edition

replies.body: Hey guys, what time Friday night will this be aired? I'm a shift worker, but want to work around the OPL schedule. Because you know, OPL trumps my life commitments.

Also, will the goody bags be available in a merch store or something? There's no hoyts cinema near me, and I couldn't drum up enough local interest for my own viewing party ({{item:3070}}). I received a goody bag from Abyss when they first hit the seen, and would love another one to flaunt in my nerdy man-cave (segregated section of the loungeroom designated by the wife :P)

Hey Supportive! The show will start at 5pm AEST on the usual channels. I'm afraid the swag bag is only available at the viewing parties, but we will be running some competitions during the Grand Final to win Lenovo laptops... could make for a nice addition to your man-cave... :)
No doubt it will WeirdyBeardy, thanks for the info, I'll let my boss know about my varying times of sicknesses. Cheers mate
